thig5.3:1.2: I was afflicted with lust for sensual pleasures.
thig5.3:1.3: In the past I was restless,
thig5.3:1.4: I had no power over the mind.
thig5.3:2.2: following the perception of the pleasant.
thig5.3:2.3: I did not attain tranquility of mind,
thig5.3:2.4: being under the dominion of the craving mind.
thig5.3:3.3: Not at day, not at night,
thig5.3:3.4: did I find happiness, but was full of afflictions.
thig5.3:4.3: Better for me to be strangled here,
thig5.3:4.4: than to go back to the inferior life.
thig5.3:5.2: I hung it to the branch of a tree.
thig5.3:5.3: As I placed the noose around the neck,
thig5.3:5.4: in that moment, my mind was liberated."
